# Electron extends

This module primarily allows injection of some common functions and modules.

---

## Browser Process & Renderer Process

---

### Module.register(name, file)

- `name`: (`string`) Module name
- `file`: (`string`) Module path

Register a module.

```typescript
Module.register('Module', __dirname);
```

---

### Module.unregister(name)

- `name`: (`string`) Module name

Unregister a module.

```typescript
Module.unregister('Module');
```

---

### Module.require(name)

- `name`: (`string`) Module name

require a module.

```typescript
Module.require('Module');
```
